mapper.select: SELECT (CASE WHEN IFNULL(MAX(WRKFRC_ID),0) = '0' then (CONCAT('WF' , IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d'), '') , '_' , IFNULL(LPAD('1',5,'0'), ''))) ELSE (CONCAT('WF' , IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d'), '') , '_' , IFNULL(LPAD(SUBSTR(MAX(WRKFRC_ID), 12, 5)+1, 5, '0'), ''))) END ) WRKFRC_ID FROM T_WLK_MNG_WRKFRC WHERE WRKFRC_ID LIKE CONCAT('WF' , IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m%d'), '') , '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_WLK_MNG_WRKFRC (WRKFRC_ID, WRKFRC_NM,WRKFRC_NMBR, WRKFRC_MOBILE, WRKFRC_SX, WRKFRC_BRTH_DT, SVC_TP, GRP_ID, MEMO, REGIST_DT, REGIST_ID, UPT_DT, UPT_ID ) VALUES (#{wrkfrcId}, #{wrkfrcNm}, #{wrkfrcNmbr}, #{wrkfrcMobile}, #{wrkfrcSx}, #{wrkfrcBrthDt}, #{svcTp}, #{grpId}, #{memo}, SYSDATE(), #{userId}, SYSDATE(), #{userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_WLK_MNG_WRKFRC SET WRKFRC_NM = #{wrkfrcNm}, WRKFRC_NMBR = #{wrkfrcNmbr}, WRKFRC_MOBILE = #{wrkfrcMobile}, WRKFRC_SX = #{wrkfrcSx}, WRKFRC_BRTH_DT = #{wrkfrcBrthDt}, SVC_TP = #{svcTp}, GRP_ID = #{grpId}, MEMO = #{memo}, UPT_DT = SYSDATE(), UPT_ID = #{userId} WHERE WRKFRC_ID = #{wrkfrcId}
